name: rv-hapi-app-market
description: Test App for APIs by RV

scripts.default: node ./index.js  port$port 4100 env$env dev ssl$ssl false
scripts.default_ssl: node ./index.js  port$port 4100 env$env dev ssl$ssl true
scripts.staging: node ./index.js  port$port 4010 env$env staging ssl$ssl true
scripts.production: node ./index.js  port$port 4011 env$env production ssl$ssl true
scripts.live: node ./index.js  port$port 4001 env$env live ssl$ssl true
scripts.default-nodemon-async-await: nodemon --harmony-async-await ./index.js  port$port 4100 env$env dev ssl$ssl false
scripts.default-nodemon: nodemon ./index.js  port$port 4100 env$env dev ssl$ssl false
scripts.default-nodemon-ssl: nodemon ./index.js  port$port 4100 env$env dev ssl$ssl true
scripts.pm-staging: node ./index.js  port$port 4010 myenv$myenv staging ssl$ssl true
scripts.pm-production: node ./index.js  port$port 4011 myenv$myenv production ssl$ssl true
scripts.pm-live: node ./index.js  port$port 4001 myenv$myenv live ssl$ssl true

author: Rachit Vyas
